parameters.text:
=Write a professional, engaging, and SEO-optimized blog article on the market for: "{{ $json.Keyword }}". Instructions: Length: 1000–1500 words Style: Plagiarism-free, human-like writing that scores 0% AI detection Language Level: IELTS Band 7 (clear, professional, natural flow) Formatting: Use real HTML tags (

,

, , ,
) for structure. Keep paragraphs short and easy to read. Use tables, bullet points, and subheadings where needed. Special Hyperlink Instructions: Donot write anything about iBOS here . For Aerodrop, include two hyperlinks: The first occurrence of Aerodrop should link to Shopify: https://apps.shopify.com/aerodrop-1?search_id=1b937dca-f186-4b07-94b7-4e4ecc9aabd6&surface_detail=aerodrop&surface_inter_position=1&surface_intra_position=1&surface_type=search Add a CTA at the end linking to the Aerodrop home page: https://aerodrop.ai/ . Content Structure: Title: Short, keyword-rich, clear (Example: n8n Automation is Booming in Email Marketing 2025) Introduction (2–3 paragraphs): Problem / Trend (what’s changing) Solution / Relevance (how the topic/tool fits in) Promise (what the reader will gain) Why This Topic Matters / Background: Explain trend, market growth, demand Include 2–3 bullet points with stats or insights Key Benefits / Features: Use table format | Benefit | Explanation | Example Use Case | How It Works (Practical Examples): Step-by-step workflows or case studies Include 2–4 examples (e.g., Cart abandonment → trigger + action) Comparison (Optional): Compare with other tools or competitors Always position our company/service at the top Why Choose [Company/Service Provider]: Show expertise, trust, reliability Include proof: industries served, global reach, cost-effectiveness Note: For informational blogs, include “How We Help” at the end Common Use Cases: Short bullet points (eCommerce, B2B, Support, Events) Best Practices / Tips: 3–5 actionable tips FAQs: 4–5 short Q&A for quick SEO wins Conclusion: Summarize key insights Emphasize urgency or relevance Include CTA (Encourage reader to work with us, adopt the tool, or contact us)

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value:
=1st Prompt- take inspiration from download photo 1:
Create a professional blog header image for AeroDrop with a clean, modern, split composition. The left half has a solid background in color #F16722 with large, bold white text showing {{ $('On form submission').item.json.Keyword }}, in a clean, modern sans-serif font, vertically centered. The right half features a realistic person (male, female, or gender-neutral) in business casual clothing, with facial expression, pose, and props that match the mood and context of {{ $('On form submission').item.json.Keyword }}. Always maintain a subtle dropshipping/e-commerce theme with minimal visual hints such as AliExpress and Shopify icons, storefront/product card shapes, or delivery package graphics in the background — soft and unobtrusive. Place the AeroDrop logo in the top-left corner exactly as shown in the provided reference image. Keep the style clean, minimal, and professional, with balanced lighting and composition.

Ensure the title does not overlap with the image. Use visuals that match the tone of the title, such as happiness or relief. 2 ta image generate korbo. 
2nd Prompt- take inspiration from download photo
